Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (MITS Public Transportation) -- 1 Mill Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide MITS Public Transportation Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax not to exceed one (1) mill on all property subject to taxation in said Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $3,415,241, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining and operating the Parish Public Transportation System for the exclusive benefit of the mobility impaired, the physically disadvantaged and the elderly in said Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Public Transportation) -- 2 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax not to exceed two (2) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $6,830,482, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining and operating the Parish Public Transportation System?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Harahan -- 3 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Harahan, State of Louisiana (the "City"), levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the City (an estimated $256,779 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining Sewerage District No. 1 of the City of Harahan, having its boundaries coextensive with the corporate limits of the City, as created by Ordinance No. 312?
